ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( BEGINS(Program__r.Name, "TA-"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Closing_Time__c, "12:00 AM"), ISPICKVAL(Sunday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "12:00 AM"),
ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Closing_Time__c, "12:00 AM"), ISPICKVAL(Monday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "12:00 AM"),
ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Closing_Time__c, "12:00 AM"), ISPICKVAL(Tuesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "12:00 AM"),
ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "10:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:00 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:15 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:30 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "11:45 PM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Closing_Time__c, "12:00 AM"), ISPICKVAL(Wednesday_Additional_Closing_Time__c , "12:00 AM") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Tax-Aide program location records, closing times cannot be later than 10PM.
